channel.title: Ni No Kunai
channel.description:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MznAY8Es5c[/youtube]
Well It's a game brought to you by level 5 studios and, wait for it, Studio Ghibli! It's coming out within the coming days here in the states, your thoughts about it or have you even heard of it?
One, of the many, features I like about it is that a lot of the cut scenes were animated by Studio Ghibli in the same hand drawn fashion as most of their widely recognized feature films ([i]Porco Rosso, My Neighbor Totoro, Kiki's delivery service, Howl's Moving Castle, Nausica of The Valley of The Wind, Laputa: Castle in the Sky, Spirited Away, Princess Mononoke[/i], etc.)

item.title: Ni No Kunai

item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4MznAY8Es5c[/youtube]

Well It’s a game brought to you by level 5 studios and, wait for it, Studio Ghibli!
It’s coming out within the coming days here in the states, your thoughts about it or have you even heard of it?

One, of the many, features I like about it is that a lot of the cut scenes were animated by Studio Ghibli in the same hand drawn fashion as most of their widely recognized feature films (Porco Rosso, My Neighbor Totoro, Kiki’s delivery service, Howl’s Moving Castle, Nausica of The Valley of The Wind, Laputa: Castle in the Sky, Spirited Away, Princess Mononoke, etc.)
